org.richfaces.renderkit

Class RendererBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.render.Renderer
      • org.richfaces.renderkit.RendererBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRowsRenderer, AjaxCommandRendererBase, AjaxOutputPanelRenderer, AjaxPollRenderer, AjaxStatusRenderer, CollapsibleSubTableTogglerRendererBase, ContextMenuRendererBase, DataScrollerBaseRenderer, DivPanelRenderer, DnDRenderBase, DragIndicatorRendererBase, DropDownMenuRendererBase, FileUploadRendererBase, FocusRendererBase, InputRendererBase, LogRendererBase, MediaOutputRenderer, MenuGroupRendererBase, MenuSeparatorRendererBase, MessageRendererBase, NotifyRendererBase, NotifyStackRendererBase, PanelBaseRenderer, PlaceholderRendererBase, PopupPanelBaseRenderer, ProgressBarBaseRenderer, ToolbarRendererBase, TreeNodeRendererBase, TreeRendererBase

    public abstract class RendererBase
extends javax.faces.render.Renderer
    Base Renderer for all chameleon Skin's and components. At most, make all common procedures and realise concrete work in "template" methods.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1.2.1 $ $Date: 2007/01/09 18:58:51 $
    Author:
    asmirnov@exadel.com (latest modification by $Author: alexsmirnov $)

      • getSkin

      • getUtils

        public RendererUtils getUtils()
        Due to big number of common utility methods, base renderer divide to 2 classes - renderer and utils. since use static methods of utility class breack object paradigm, we use getter for concrete util instance. Developer can override any utility metod in 2 stages : 1) Create subclass of RendererUtils and override utility method. 2) Override this method for return instance of such subclass.
        Returns:
        Returns the utils.

      • getComponentClass

        protected Class<? extends javax.faces.component.UIComponent> getComponentClass()
        Get base component slass , targetted for this renderer. Used for check arguments in decode/encode.
        Returns:
